name: favicon-mode-switcher
description: ðŸ•¯ Make your favicon adapt to dark and light mode

scripts.build: npm run babel && npm run minify && npm run version
scripts.babel: npm run babel:umd && npm run babel:cjs && npm run babel:esm
scripts.babel:umd: cross-env MODULE=umd npx babel favicon-mode-switcher.js -o dist/index.umd.js
scripts.babel:cjs: cross-env MODULE=commonjs npx babel favicon-mode-switcher.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.babel:esm: cross-env MODULE=esm npx babel favicon-mode-switcher.js -o dist/index.mjs
scripts.minify: npm run minify:umd && npm run minify:cjs && npm run minify:esm
scripts.minify:umd: npx terser dist/index.umd.js -o dist/index.umd.min.js -m -c passes=3 --comments false --mangle-props regex="/linkElement|hrefConfig|baseHref/" -d DEBUG=false
scripts.minify:cjs: npx terser dist/index.js -o dist/index.min.js -m -c passes=3 --comments false --mangle-props regex="/linkElement|hrefConfig|baseHref/" -d DEBUG=false --module
scripts.minify:esm: npx terser dist/index.mjs -o dist/index.min.mjs -m -c passes=3 --comments false --mangle-props regex="/linkElement|hrefConfig|baseHref/" -d DEBUG=false --module

author: Jonas Kuske
